intent_atoms.description: Implement FilesystemAccess facade with asynchronous openFile, saveFile, createBookmark, and resolveBookmarkData operations for sandbox compliance.
FilesystemAccess facade must support security-scoped URL activation, hashed logging, and bookmark helpers as specified in the source files.
Add macOS-only FilesystemAccess.live() adapter that bridges to NSOpenPanel/NSSavePanel for file dialogs.
FilesystemAccess.live() must expose shared flows without regressing sandbox behaviour and integrate UIDocumentPicker adapters on iOS/iPadOS.
Wire the new facade into app and CLI entry points, persisting bookmarks alongside recents/session stores per Phase G workplan.
Bookmarks must be persisted correctly and integrated with existing recents and session storage mechanisms.
Security-scoped bookmarks must remain valid across app launches and sandbox boundaries.
Use a facade pattern for FilesystemAccess to abstract platform-specific file access logic.
Create focused unit tests covering successful access flows, stale bookmark handling, authorization failures, and logging behaviours.
Unit tests must verify all specified scenarios and log outputs.
Implement a separate test suite for the FilesystemAccess API.
